Topic.Title: Slice! Boil! Fry! - A Cooking Simulation

Posts.EditableText:
>_This is an enjoyable cooking competition simulation! Join Miso on her quest to get to the top of the cooking world !!_

This game is one of my first time experimenting with quest a little more, and I'm really happy with how it turned out! I hope you guys enjoy it and thanks to the people that helped make it a reality.

http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/lm2kl4bfwecihttpkqtbpg/slice-boil-fry
